00037 /*
00038  * \file ngram_model_arpa.h ARPABO text format for N-Gram models
00039  *
00040  * Author: David Huggins-Daines <dhuggins@cs.cmu.edu>
00041  */
00042 
00043 #ifndef __NGRAM_MODEL_ARPA_H__
00044 #define __NGRAM_MODEL_ARPA_H__
00045 
00046 #include "ngram_model_internal.h"
00047 #include "lm3g_model.h"
00048 
00052 struct bigram_s {
00053     uint32 wid; 
00054     uint16 prob2;       
00055     uint16 bo_wt2;      
00056     uint16 trigrams;    
00058 };
00059 
00066 struct trigram_s {
00067     uint32 wid;   
00068     uint16 prob3; 
00069 };
00070 
00071 
00075 typedef struct ngram_model_arpa_s {
00076     ngram_model_t base;  
00077     lm3g_model_t lm3g;  
00079     /* Arrays of unique bigram probs and bo-wts, and trigram probs
00080      * (these are temporary, actually) */
00081     sorted_list_t sorted_prob2;
00082     sorted_list_t sorted_bo_wt2;
00083     sorted_list_t sorted_prob3;
00084 } ngram_model_arpa_t;
00085 
00086 #endif /* __NGRAM_MODEL_ARPA_H__ */
